title: BareTay Recliner Armchair-Set of 2, Lift Chair For the Elderly, Power Recliner Chair with Massage & Heat, Extended Footrest, Type C+USB Ports, 2 Cup Holders, Dual Side Pockets Reclining Chairs
features: What You Get : Set of 2 Recliner Armchair

Power Lift Recliner Chair Assisted Standing : Selected frames and power motors make lifting and laying down smooth, with a maximum weight capacity of 150 KG/350 lbs. The 45° assisted standing function, which allows the elderly to stand with a better distribution of their body pressure

Total Relaxation Recliner Armchair : Are you tired of the tiredness that life's busyness brings you? This total suppoort lift chair has 5 modes and 2 vibration intensities to choose from, and the lumbar area can be heated, with the heat combining with the massage function for even more relaxation. The remote control also has a timer function to give you even more customisation options

Convenient Type-C & USB Ports Design : The recliners is not only a place of rest, but also a place of entertainment. Supporting Type-C and USB port charging, you can charge your mobile phone anytime and anywhere without worrying about running out of power and affecting your experience. It also comes with 2 side pockets and 2 cup holders to keep your personal belongings or snacks and drinks at hand

Larger Angle Rest : You can easily find the most comfortable angle from 45-140° to relax. Whether you are reading, playing a game, watching TV or simply closing your eyes and enjoying a massage, the sofa chair provides ultimate comfort and pleasure, which is a great choice for surprising parents, partners, and friends

Selected Upholstered & Fabric : The fabric used in the reclining chair not only focuses on comfort, but also has the characteristics of softness and ease of care. The wider backrest, cushions and footrests are filled with high-quality sponge, allowing you to experience a more comfortable nap. The colour has been adjusted many times, the overall appearance is beautiful, easier to match your home decoration style

Simple Installation & Reliable Service : The massage chair comes with easy-to-follow installation instructions and can be installed in just 3 steps. Not only that, it also comes with a detailed installation video for your reference. If you have any questions about the product or the process of using it,we would be glad to hear from you.
